transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir abhi voice sun rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan abhi aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan Ankita baat kar rahi hu sir Mohit ke manager Indiamart team se.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir kal aapka feedback receive hua tha hamare paas not satisfied hai aap hamare services ya account manager ko lekar.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Uske regarding baat kar rahe the.
Customer: Maine Mohit ko nahi account manager ka koi bhul nahi hai Mohit se koi mujhe complaint nahi hai Mohit is good and fair.
Customer: But entire situation jo jo theory aapka hai pattern about that main bol raha hu.
Customer: Kyunki abhi bhi main wo lead dal raha hu to usme wahi aa raha hai ke bhai wo kuch pankha dikha raha hai ghar ka pankha dikha raha hai tower fan dikha raha hai cooling tower fan dikha to kabhi aur dikha raha hai aur wo jyada lead aa rahi hai to uspe kaam nahi ho raha hai dusri baat jo hai ke about jo product ki main baat kar raha hu wo gradual consumption tank hai fir ye pani ka tanki hai wo uske bare mein thoda baat kar raha hu to uske bare mein wo log kuch samajh hi nahi pa rahe technically issue aa raha hai barabar unko ye main abhi ye cheez maine Mohit ko hi bola ki mujhe Ankita hamesha repeat nahi karna hai Mohit se mera already bahut sara discuss ho chuka hai kal barabar Mohit ki koi galti nahi hai Mohit mujhe continue follow up le raha hai mujhe koi problem nahi hai theek hai lekin problem ye hai ki abhi Mohit to akela nahi baitha hai na.
Executive: Nahi hai.
Executive: Sir theek hai Mohit ke feedback ka ki baat nahi hai baat ye hai ki aap Indiamart services use kar rahe hain.
Executive: To the thing is that ki aapko Indiamart ke services sahi mil rahi hai ki nahi aapko.
Customer: Main wahi to bol raha hu abhi India main main main dekho mujhe aapka system mujhe samajh mein nahi ki aap kaise buylead generate maine aapko example bhi de diya hai national cooling tower aur Himgiri cooling tower ko jo lead aati hai wo lead mujhe chahiye.
Executive: Sir aapke paas jo product target hai cooling tower se related.
Executive: Right usme koi bhi cooling fan nahi hai aapne ye remove bhi karwaye the.
Customer: Nahi cooling fan nahi cooling fan matlab cooling tower fan matlab cooling tower fan matlab cooling tower matlab wo ghar ke tower fan thodi rehte hai cooling usko tower fan bola jata hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir jaise aapka product hai cooling tower to aapka product cooling tower hai ya cooling tower fan hai sir ye puch rahi hu.
Customer: Cooling tower bhi hai cooling tower fan bhi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Suniye cooling tower ho gaya main product ho gaya theek hai aur cooling tower fan ye spare ho gaya spare ho gaya spare.
Customer: Dono cheez hai dono cheez hai.
Customer: Okay aur teesra seed wo uska to theek hai fir usme to koi issue nahi hai uski lead bhi aa rahi hai first class usko main follow up bhi le raha hu lekin usme jyada competition rehta hu to main usme jyada interest nahi leta hu competition bahut rehta hai usme.
Customer: Lekin cooling tower fan aur main cooling tower usme thoda gadbad ho raha hai cooling tower fan is cooling tower spare theek hai and cooling tower is a cooling tower product matlab samajh lijiye aapko for example main deta hu ki aap tubelight lete hai barabar.
Customer: Tubelight is a product barabar.
Customer: Theek hai aur tubelight switch is a spare ya tubelight capacitor barabar capacitor is a spare.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Like parts ho gaye ya usse related products ho gaye ye aap keh sakte hai.
Customer: Haan parts parts ho gaye spare ho gaye spare part ho gaye spare part rehte hai na koi cheez spare part se hi banti hai na aur cooling tower water ho jati hai that is also cooling tower spare.
Customer: Aur ek example aapko main.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ki aapke paas fans ke jo home use wale fans ke lead aa rahe hain.
Executive: Haan haan jo tank aur haan aur cooling tower tanki jo hai na cooling tower tanki to cooling tower tanki is the tank cooling tower ke bhi tank rehta hai theek hai niche matlab cooling tower kya hai wo wo aapke sales executive ko samajhna jaruri hai theek hai I am not a teacher agar agar what is cooling tower product samajh lenge to it will be very simple and easy to cooling tower spare mein cooling tower tanki bhi aati hai.
Customer: Haan haan jo cooling tower tanki hai na.
Customer: Samjha wo na aap cooling tower cooling tower ki jo tanki hai na.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Cooling tower jo tanki hai na theek hai wo dalte hai na wo log to cooling tower ki jagah wo ghar ki tanki aur sintex ki tanki aati hai malum pani consumption karne barabar.
Executive: Main dekh rahi hu water tank ki kuch leads available hai jaise aapka water tank hota hai uski lead aa rahi hai aapke paas.
Customer: Haan haan matlab wo wo tank konsi rehti hai malum sintex tank rehti hai.
Executive: Haan haan jo sintex ki jo tanki rehti hai pani ki haan wo.
Customer: Kali rehti hai black rehti hai white rehti hai.
Customer: Wo HDP ki rehti hai wo that is total different lekin usko pronounce tank hi kiya jata hai.
Customer: To uske wajah se bhi wo dikkat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir iska ek solution hai jiske regarding maine aapko call kiya hai actually Mohit ne mujhe kal aapse baat karke matlab half of the scenario to bata diya tha sir jaise aapke paas jo matlab home use ke water tank ke lead aa rahi hai ya aap keh sakte hai cooling fan ke lead aa rahi hai jo home use ki hai us.
Executive: Category ko aapke Indiamart ke panel pe remove karne ka ek option hai remove ya exclude hum keh sakte hain ki aapke panel se wo category hi hum exclude kar rahe hain so that in future aapko jo aaye bhi wo aapka jo cooling tower tanki aur lead ya cooling tower fan ki aaye.
Executive: To iske regarding mujhe aapko guide karna hoga steps actually aapka ek lead preference ka tab hota hai jisme aapki activity pe depend karta hai ki aap kaise kaise lead Indiamart se consume karte hain uske basis pe hum preference dete hain ki ye category aapme deal kar rahe ho par ye wali category aapko bilkul hi deal nahi karni hai to kya main abhi guide karu aapko wo aapko jo manual.
Customer: Matlab wo apne ko wo laptop nikal ke baithna padega.
Executive: Phone se bhi ho jayega laptop laptop nikal ke login karke hello Ankita Ankita Ankita laptop nikal ke login karna padega na apne ko Indiamart mein jaake.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji ya to aap se ya to laptop se jis tarike se bhi aap available ho.
Customer: To wo to ha wo to Mohit bhi kar sakte hai ki aap bhi kar sakte ho dono kar sakte ho.
Executive: Nahi hum dono ka matlab hum ya main ya Mohit hum log aapko guide karenge the thing is that ki hamare nahi hota hai.
Customer: Aapko mujhe karna hai.
Executive: Haan karna aapko hai hum guide kar sakte hain kyunki dekhiye kya hota hai na ki agar executive ke end pe agar ye rahega to kai bari jo actual product ke knowledge wo aapko hi rehti hai aur ek ek jo executive hai wo kuch manipulation bhi kar sakte hain that's why hum aapko sirf guide kar sakte hain you have to remove wrong category jaise humne pehle ek baar.
Customer: Main kya main main kya bol raha hu suno main kya bol raha hu main abhi thoda sa 11 baje ke baad mere ko thoda free ho jata hu to mujhe koi koi Mohit ko direct phone kar do chalega ya aapko phone karu ispe lagaunga to fir koi aur phone pe chala jayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi isi number pe call kijiye sir ye mera personal recorded call number hai theek hai.
Customer: Ye personal hai na tere pe hi jayega na direct.
Executive: Ye mere paas hi aayega recorded call hai but mere number pe land hota hai.
Customer: 0481338945 bata raha hai to.
Executive: Haan haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai to main thoda free ho jata hu to tere ko directly phone karta hu laptop nikal ke fir baithte hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji okay sir.
Customer: Okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting irrelevant leads (home use fans).

- Technical issues understanding product requirements.

- Wants leads for cooling towers and tanks.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide removing irrelevant categories.

- Explained lead preferences tab for category exclusion.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, cooling tower, product category, exclusion
